TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XAttribute extends System.Xml.Linq.XObject

summary.span: 表示 XML 特性。

span.span: Represents an XML attribute.

remarks.format: ## Remarks XML 属性是一个 XML 元素与关联的名称/值对。An XML attribute is a name/value pair associated with an XML element. 每个包含该元素的特性的列表。Each contains a list of the attributes for that element. 属性必须是唯一的元素的限定的名称。Attributes must have a qualified name that is unique to the element. 属性不派生自; 它们不是 XML 树中的节点。Attributes are not derived from ; they are not nodes in the XML tree. 相反，它们是只需与元素关联的名称/值对。Instead, they are simply name/value pairs associated with an element. 属性保留的 XML 树中它们添加到元素的顺序。Attributes are maintained in the XML tree in the order that they were added to the element. 当返回的属性集合，它们已添加到元素，并没有对排序顺序返回它们。When a collection of attributes is returned by , they are returned in the order that they were added to the element, and are not sorted. 从技术上讲，在 XML 中，命名空间声明不是正确的特性。Technically, in XML, namespace declarations are not attributes proper. 但是，许多 XML 程序员通常不加以区分。However, this distinction is not normally made by many XML programmers. 相反，由于命名空间声明的 XML 语法与属性完全相同，因此大多数 XML 程序员将命名空间作为属性。Instead, because namespace declarations have exactly the same XML syntax as attributes, most XML programmers think of namespaces as attributes. 若要简化[!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](~/includes/sqltecxlinq-md.md)]编程接口，命名空间中表示 XML 树为属性。To simplify the [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](~/includes/sqltecxlinq-md.md)] programming interface, namespaces are represented in the XML tree as attributes. 此类命名空间属性影响序列化的 XML 树。Such namespace attributes impact serialization of an XML tree. 序列化时，[!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](~/includes/sqltecxlinq-md.md)]尝试序列化时使用命名空间特性中指定的命名空间前缀。When serializing, [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](~/includes/sqltecxlinq-md.md)] attempts to serialize with the namespace prefix specified in namespace attributes. 可以使用来确定属性是否真正是命名空间声明。You can use the to determine if an attribute is really a namespace declaration. 类派生自 。The class derives from . 可以将批注添加到属性，并观察发生的事件。You can add annotations to attributes, and observe events for them. 某些可以从 XAML 使用方法。Some methods can be used from XAML. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [LINQ to XML 动态属性](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0455f47c-4a68-4f2e-a3f8-dd1d85b99012)。For more information, see [LINQ to XML Dynamic Properties](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0455f47c-4a68-4f2e-a3f8-dd1d85b99012).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在创建 XML 树的深层副本时，此构造函数主要用于在内部。This constructor is primarily used internally when making a deep copy of an XML tree. ## Examples 此示例演示了创建 XML 树的深层副本创建的副本，不克隆，在树中的属性。This example demonstrates that creating a deep copy of an XML tree creates a copy, not a clone, of an attribute in the tree. ```csharp XElement root1 = XElement.Parse(""); // Make a deep copy. XElement root2 = new XElement(root1); if (root1.Attribute("Att1") == root2.Attribute("Att1")) Console.WriteLine("This will not be printed"); else Console.WriteLine("Creating a deep copy created a new attribute from the original."); ``` ```vb Dim root1 As XElement = ' Make a deep copy. Dim root2 As XElement = New XElement(root1) If root1.Attribute("Att1") Is root2.Attribute("Att1") Then Console.WriteLine("This will not be printed") Else Console.WriteLine("Creating a deep copy created a new attribute from the original.") End If ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ``` Creating a deep copy created a new attribute from the original. ```

summary.span: 确定此属性是否为命名空间声明。

span.span: Determines if this attribute is a namespace declaration.

value.span: 如果此属性为命名空间声明，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if this attribute is a namespace declaration; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从技术上讲，在 XML 中，命名空间声明不是正确的特性。Technically, in XML, namespace declarations are not attributes proper. 但是，大部分 XML 程序员通常不加以区分。However, this distinction is not normally made by most XML programmers. 相反，由于命名空间声明属性的语法完全相同，因此大多数 XML 程序员将命名空间作为属性。Instead, because namespace declarations have exactly the same syntax as attributes, most XML programmers think of namespaces as attributes. 若要简化[!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](~/includes/sqltecxlinq-md.md)]编程接口，命名空间中表示 XML 树为属性。To simplify the [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](~/includes/sqltecxlinq-md.md)] programming interface, namespaces are represented in the XML tree as attributes. 可以使用此属性来确定特定[!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](~/includes/sqltecxlinq-md.md)]属性实际上是命名空间声明。You can use this property to determine if a particular [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](~/includes/sqltecxlinq-md.md)] attribute is really a namespace declaration. ## Examples 以下示例创建的命名空间声明属性和属性不是。The following example creates an attribute that is a namespace declaration and an attribute that is not. 然后使用此属性以显示是否每个属性为命名空间声明。It then uses this property to display whether each attribute is a namespace declaration or not. ```csharp XNamespace aw = "http://www.adventure-works.com"; XElement root = new XElement(aw + "Root", new XAttribute(XNamespace.Xmlns + "aw", "http://www.adventure-works.com"), new XAttribute(aw + "Att", "content") ); foreach (XAttribute att in root.Attributes()) { if (att.IsNamespaceDeclaration) Console.WriteLine("{0} is a namespace declaration", att.Name); else Console.WriteLine("{0} is not a namespace declaration", att.Name); } ``` ```vb Dim root As XElement = For Each att As XAttribute In root.Attributes() If (att.IsNamespaceDeclaration) Then Console.WriteLine("{0} is a namespace declaration", att.Name) Else Console.WriteLine("{0} is not a namespace declaration", att.Name) End If Next ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ``` {http://www.w3.org/2000/xmlns/}aw is a namespace declaration {http://www.adventure-works.com}Att is not a namespace declaration ```

summary.span: 获取此属性的扩展名。

span.span: Gets the expanded name of this attribute.

value.span: 一个包含此属性 (Attribute) 名称的 。

span.span: An containing the name of this attribute.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性返回的扩展的名称采用的形式`{namespace}localname`。The expanded name returned by this property is in the form of `{namespace}localname`. ## Examples 下面的示例创建具有三个属性的元素。The following example creates an element with three attributes. 然后使用此属性以输出每个属性的名称。It then uses this property to print out the name of each attribute. 该示例还演示如何创建使用现有属性的名称的新属性。The example also shows creation of a new attribute using the name of an existing attribute. ```csharp XNamespace aw = "http://www.adventure-works.com"; XElement root = new XElement(aw + "Root", new XAttribute(XNamespace.Xmlns + "aw", "http://www.adventure-works.com"), new XAttribute(aw + "Att", "content"), new XAttribute("Att2", "different content") ); foreach (XAttribute att in root.Attributes()) Console.WriteLine("{0}={1}", att.Name, att.Value); Console.WriteLine(""); XElement newRoot = new XElement(aw + "Root", from att in root.Attributes("Att2") select new XAttribute(att.Name, "new content")); foreach (XAttribute att in newRoot.Attributes()) Console.WriteLine("{0}={1}", att.Name, att.Value); ``` ```vb Dim root As XElement = _ For Each att As XAttribute In root.Attributes() Console.WriteLine("{0}={1}", att.Name, att.Value) Next Console.WriteLine("") Dim NewRoot As XElement = _ >_ For Each att As XAttribute In NewRoot.Attributes() Console.WriteLine("{0}={1}", att.Name, att.Value) Next ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ``` {http://www.w3.org/2000/xmlns/}aw=http://www.adventure-works.com {http://www.adventure-works.com}Att=content Att2=different content Att2=new content ```

summary.span: 获取父元素的下一个属性。

span.span: Gets the next attribute of the parent element.

value.span: 一个包含父元素下一个属性 (Attribute) 的 。

span.span: An containing the next attribute of the parent element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性保留的 XML 树中它们添加到元素的顺序。Attributes are maintained in the XML tree in the order that they were added to the element. 当返回的属性集合，它们已添加，并且不会进行排序顺序返回它们。When a collection of attributes is returned by , they are returned in the order that they were added, and are not sorted. 当请求通过此属性的下一个属性时，此属性将返回此属性之后添加的属性。When you request the next attribute through this property, this property returns the attribute that was added after this attribute. 如果此属性不具有父级，或者如果没有下一个特性，则此属性返回`null`。If this attribute does not have a parent, or if there is no next attribute, then this property returns `null`. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何循环访问元素使用此属性的属性。The following example shows how to iterate through the attributes of an element using this property. ```csharp XElement root = new XElement("Root", new XAttribute("Att1", 1), new XAttribute("Att2", 2), new XAttribute("Att3", 3), new XAttribute("Att4", 4) ); XAttribute att = root.FirstAttribute; do { Console.WriteLine(att); } while((att = att.NextAttribute) != null); ``` ```vb Dim root As XElement = Dim att As XAttribute = root.FirstAttribute Dim val As Boolean = True Do Console.WriteLine(att) att = att.NextAttribute Loop While (Not (att Is Nothing)) ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ``` Att1="1" Att2="2" Att3="3" Att4="4" ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因为所有类的都派生自包含属性，您可以编写代码进行操作的具体子类的集合。Because all classes that derive from contain a property, you can write code that operates on collections of concrete subclass of . 你的代码随后可以针对集合中每个节点的节点类型测试。Your code can then test for the node type of each node in the collection. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个特性，然后显示使用此属性的节点类型。The following example creates an attribute, and then displays the node type using this property. ```csharp XElement root = new XElement("Root", new XAttribute("Att", "content") ); XAttribute att = root.FirstAttribute; Console.WriteLine(att.NodeType); ``` ```vb Dim root As XElement = Dim att As XAttribute = root.FirstAttribute Console.WriteLine(att.NodeType.ToString) ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ``` Attribute ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在将转换为从某个属性或元素，允许的值为"0"、"1"和任何字符串，它会生成"true"或"false"转换为小写形式。When converting to from an attribute or element, allowed values are "0", "1", and any string that produces "true" or "false" after trimming and conversion to lower case. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个特性，其值，然后将强制转换到。The following example creates an attribute with a value, then casts it to . ```csharp XElement root = new XElement("Root", new XAttribute("BoolValue", true) ); bool bv = (bool)root.Attribute("BoolValue"); Console.WriteLine("(bool)BoolValue={0}", bv); ``` ```vb Dim root As XElement = Dim bv As Boolean = CBool(root.Attribute("BoolValue")) Console.WriteLine("(bool)BoolValue={0}", bv) ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ``` (bool)BoolValue=True ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此转换运算符使用类进行转换。This conversion operator uses the class to do the conversion. ## Examples 下面的示例将创建具有日期和时间的内容属性The following example creates an attribute with date and time content. 它然后将其强制转换到检索值。It then casts it to to retrieve the value. ```csharp XElement root = new XElement("Root", new XAttribute("Att", new DateTimeOffset(new DateTime(2006, 10, 6, 12, 30, 0))) ); Console.WriteLine(root); // casting from a strictly formatted XML attribute DateTimeOffset dt = (DateTimeOffset)root.Attribute("Att"); Console.WriteLine("dt={0}", dt); ``` ```vb Dim root As XElement = _ /> Console.WriteLine(root) ' casting from a strictly formatted XML attribute Dim dt As DateTimeOffset = CType(root.Attribute("Att"), DateTimeOffset) Console.WriteLine("dt={0}", dt) ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ``` dt=10/6/2006 12:30:00 PM -07:00 ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性或包含日期和时间的内容的元素的值空间与日期和时间 ISO 8601 中所述紧密相关。The value space of an attribute or element that contains date and time content is closely related to the dates and times described in ISO 8601. 创建属性或元素，其中包含日期和时间的内容时，请按照 W3C 规范格式化属性或元素值。When creating an attribute or element that contains date and time content, the attribute or element values are formatted per the W3C specification. 请参阅 W3C 规范的更多详细信息。See the W3C specification for more details. 转换为时，行为并不严格的从某个属性或元素。Behavior is lax when casting to a of from an attribute or element. 即使格式属性或元素值不是完全按照 W3C 规范，值适当地转换为的。Even if the attribute or element value is not formatted exactly per the W3C specification, the value is appropriately converted to a of . 使用此转换运算符若要从转换。This conversion operator uses to convert from a . ## Examples 下面的示例创建日期和时间作为内容属性。The following example creates an attribute with a date and time as content. 然后检索的值通过强制转换为的。It then retrieves the value by casting to of . ```csharp XElement root = new XElement("Root", new XAttribute("Att", new DateTime(2006, 10, 6, 12, 30, 0)) ); DateTime? value = (DateTime?)root.Attribute("Att"); Console.WriteLine("Nullable DateTime: value={0}", value == null ? "null" : value.ToString()); ``` ```vb Dim root As XElement = /> Dim value As Nullable(Of DateTime) = CType(root.Attribute("Att"), Nullable(Of DateTime)) Console.WriteLine("Nullable DateTime: value={0}", IIf(value.HasValue, value.ToString(), "null")) ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ``` Nullable DateTime: value=10/6/2006 12:30:00 PM ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性或包含时间跨度内容的元素的值空间与 ISO 8601 中所述的持续时间内容紧密相关。The value space of an attribute or element that contains time span content is closely related to duration content as described in ISO 8601. 在创建时的属性或包含时间跨度内容的元素，请按照 W3C 规范格式化属性或元素值。When creating an attribute or element that contains time span content, the attribute or element values are formatted per the W3C specification. 请参阅 W3C 规范的更多详细信息。Please see the W3C specification for more details. 转换为时，行为并不严格从某个属性或元素。Behavior is lax when casting to a from an attribute or element. 即使格式属性或元素值不是完全按照 W3C 规范，值适当地转换为。Even if the attribute or element value is not formatted exactly per the W3C specification, the value is appropriately converted to a . ## Examples 下面的示例将创建具有时间跨度内容属性The following example creates an attribute with time span content. 然后检索的值通过强制转换为。It then retrieves the value by casting to . ```csharp XElement root = new XElement("Root", new XAttribute("Att", new TimeSpan(1, 5, 30)) ); TimeSpan value = (TimeSpan)root.Attribute("Att"); Console.WriteLine("value={0}", value); ``` ```vb Dim root As XElement = /> Dim value As TimeSpan = CType(root.Attribute("Att"), TimeSpan) Console.WriteLine("value={0}", value) ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ``` value=01:05:30 ```

summary.span: 获取父元素的上一个属性。

span.span: Gets the previous attribute of the parent element.

value.span: 一个包含父元素的上一个属性 (Attribute) 的 。

span.span: An containing the previous attribute of the parent element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性保留的 XML 树中它们添加到元素的顺序。Attributes are maintained in the XML tree in the order that they were added to the element. 当返回的属性集合，它们已添加，并且不会进行排序顺序返回它们。When a collection of attributes is returned by , they are returned in the order that they were added, and are not sorted. 当请求通过此属性的上一个属性时，此属性将返回此属性之前已添加的属性。When you request the previous attribute through this property, this property returns the attribute that was added before this attribute. 如果此属性不具有父级，或者如果此属性是第一个属性，则此属性返回`null`。If this attribute does not have a parent, or if this attribute is the first attribute, then this property returns `null`. 类将其属性存储的单向链接列表为对象。The class stores its attributes as a singly-linked list of objects. 这意味着，属性必须遍历的属于元素的属性列表。This means that the property must traverse the list of attributes that belong to the element. 因此，使用此属性可能会影响应用的性能。Therefore, using this property might affect your performance. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何循环访问元素使用此属性的属性。The following example shows how to iterate through the attributes of an element using this property. ```csharp XElement root = new XElement("Root", new XAttribute("Att1", 1), new XAttribute("Att2", 2), new XAttribute("Att3", 3), new XAttribute("Att4", 4) ); XAttribute att = root.LastAttribute; do { Console.WriteLine(att); } while((att = att.PreviousAttribute) != null); ``` ```vb Dim root As XElement = Dim att As XAttribute = root.LastAttribute Dim val As Boolean = True Do Console.WriteLine(att) att = att.PreviousAttribute Loop While (Not (att Is Nothing)) ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ``` Att4="4" Att3="3" Att2="2" Att1="1" ```

span.span: Removes this attribute from its parent element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法可用于修改 XML 树。You can use this method to modify an XML tree. 此方法将导致事件发生。This method will cause events to occur. 有许多方案中，可能想要删除的一组属性。There are many scenarios in which you might want to remove a set of attributes. 在[!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](~/includes/sqltecxlinq-md.md)]编程，您不应处理或修改的一组节点，而您在查询中设置该节点。In [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](~/includes/sqltecxlinq-md.md)] programming, you should not manipulate or modify a set of nodes while you are querying for nodes in that set. 实际上，这意味着您不应循环访问一组属性，将其删除。In practical terms, this means that you should not iterate over a set of attributes and remove them. 相反，您应将其具体化为使用扩展方法。Instead, you should materialize them into a using the extension method. 然后循环访问列表中，并删除属性。Then you can iterate over the list, removing the attributes. 有关详细信息，请参阅[混合声明性代码/命令性代码问题 (LINQ to XML)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d9a5c404-2b0e-46cd-a358-0e78773b3094)。For more information, see [Mixed Declarative Code/Imperative Code Bugs (LINQ to XML)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d9a5c404-2b0e-46cd-a358-0e78773b3094). 或者，如果你想要删除的属性集，建议你使用方法。Alternatively, if you want to remove a set of attributes, it is recommended that you use the method. 此方法将这些属性复制到列表中，然后循环访问列表中，删除属性。This method copies the attributes to a list, then iterates over the list, removing the attributes. ## Examples 下面的示例创建具有三个属性的元素。The following example creates an element with three attributes. 然后删除其中一个特性。It then removes one of the attributes. ```csharp XElement root = new XElement("Root", new XAttribute("Att1", "content1"), new XAttribute("Att2", "content2"), new XAttribute("Att3", "content3") ); XAttribute att = root.Attribute("Att2"); att.Remove(); Console.WriteLine(root); ``` ```vb Dim root As XElement = Dim att As XAttribute = root.Attribute("Att2") att.Remove() Console.WriteLine(root) ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ``` ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法返回的字符串的形式`AttributeName="content"`。This method returns a string in the form of `AttributeName="content"`. > [!WARNING] > 当调用此方法和包含控制字符，将引发异常并类似这样的消息： 十六进制值 0x0B，是无效的字符。When this method is called and contains control character, an exception is thrown with a message like: hexadecimal value 0x0B, is an invalid character. ## Examples 下面的示例创建具有多个属性的元素。The following example creates an element with several attributes. 然后，获取一个属性，并通过调用此方法显示它和其内容。It then gets an attribute and displays it and its content by calling this method. ```csharp XElement root = new XElement("Root", new XAttribute("Att1", "content1"), new XAttribute("Att2", "content2"), new XAttribute("Att3", "content3") ); XAttribute att = root.Attribute("Att2"); Console.WriteLine(att.ToString()); ``` ```vb Dim root As XElement = Dim att As XAttribute = root.Attribute("Att2") Console.WriteLine(att.ToString()) ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ``` Att2="content2" ```
